heading: A Big Building of Paris
desc: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It is named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower.

heading: Crisps Media has launched app which enables news distro by AI
desc: In an interview held this saturday in Biratnagar, Anjani Kumar Thakur, spokesperson at Crisps Media announced that the company will be adding sentiment analysis that can enable the user to get a rich experience. We are also planning to link this in a hyperlocal environment to connect users locally with services, Anjani added. This is a 60 words sample text.
